short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dim unwanted tweets on your Twitter For You page using GPT.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dim unwanted tweets on the Twitter "For You" timeline by letting AI decide which tweets are relevant. Skip setting large mute lists and let GPT do the work for you.

Requires an OpenAI API key. The key is only stored locally in your browser.

Currently blocked topics:

1. political commentary
2. diss another person
3. here is why this is important
4. promoted tweets
